bug.author: machinedogwc
bug.summary: install error of Semi-Automatic Segmentation with Deep Extreme Cut
bug.description: I tried several versions of openvino, but always got the error below, and I can't find 2018 R5.0.1 from the official website. Could help to provide a usable openvino package? l_openvino_toolkit_p_2018.5.445 l_openvino_toolkit_p_2019.1.094 l_openvino_toolkit_p_2019.3.376 " Type "accept" to continue or "decline" to go back to the previous menu: Incorrect input, please try again "

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/machinedogwc>@machinedogwc</denchmark-link> Hi, please don't ignore the issue template. Could you please specify CVAT version, OS and exact steps to reproduce the issue.

@machinedogwc Hi, please don't ignore the issue template. Could you please specify CVAT version, OS and exact steps to reproduce the issue.
I am sorry, that I am not familiar with the issue template. I tried v1.0.0-beta.2ï¼ŒWindows 10_64. I followed the instruction below: OpenVINO component is also needed docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f components/openvino/docker-compose.openvino.yml -f cvat/apps/dextr_segmentation/docker-compose.dextr.yml build I got a lot of "Type "accept" to continue or "decline" to go back to the previous menu: Incorrect input, please try again" after several minutes. Thanks.
